## BREAKING CHANGE

ChartProps fields are removed and renamed.

* test: update tests

* fix: unit tests

* fix: type

No longer accept chartProps as a single prop in <SuperChart>. Developers must specify each field in chartProps individually.

some api and types are removed from [@superset](https://github.com/superset)-ui/chart and moved to /query

* feat: split superset-ui/query from superset-ui/chart

* fix: update references

* test: fix broken tests

* refactor: rename ChartFormData to QueryFormData

* fix: rename file

* fix: remove annotation layer from query package

[@superset](https://github.com/superset)-ui/core becomes peer dependency

NumberFormat.xxx are renamed

* feat: Make smart number default formatter

* fix: add unit test

* refactor: move formatters outside


<a name="actions-runner-controller-0.21.0"></a>
## [actions-runner-controller-0.21.0] - 2024-10-15
## Bug Fixes

* Prefix runner pod related annotation keys with `actions/` to make them distinguishable from other annotations
* RunnerDeployment should clean up old RunnerReplicaSets ASAP
* Paginate ListRepositoryWorkflowRuns ([#295](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/295))
* duplicate name attribute ([#318](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/318))
* add trunate to ensure service kinds have valid names ([#325](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/325))
* fixing mising pip PATH ([#585](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/585))
* make AGENT_TOOLSDIRECTORY an env var ([#657](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/657))
* arch type with downloading dumb-init. ([#723](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/723))
* annotate pod instead of label on UnregistrationFailureMessage ([#1615](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1615))
* RunnerDeployment was not working at all after field indexing enhancement
* scaling issue based on `workflow_job` event ([#850](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/850))
* allow GH priv key from env in helm chart ([#884](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/884))
* don't base64 decode secret strings ([#1683](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1683))
* pagination for ListWorkflowJobs in autoscaler ([#990](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/990)) ([#992](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/992))
* use copy instead of move ([#1066](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1066))
* configure logger before trying to log ([#1128](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1128))
* Do recreate runner pod on registration token update ([#1087](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1087))
* runner pods managed by RunnerSet to not stuck in Terminating ([#1420](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1420))
* Do not block indefinitely on runner that cannot be deleted due to 403
* Let RunnerDeployment scale RunnerReplicaSet to zero before terminating it
* forgot to do the chart ([#1388](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1388))
* report busy status for offline workers ([#1009](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1009))
* Avoid duplicate volume and mount name error for generic ephemeral volume as "work" ([#1471](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1471))
* force restartPolicy "Never" to prevent runner pods from stucking in Terminating when the container disappeared ([#1395](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1395))
* **chart:** add namespace selector to webhooks when in singleNamespace mode ([#1237](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1237))
* **chart:** allow to use basic auth when authSecret.create is false ([#1149](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1149))
* **chart:** add missing namespace to webhook.ingress ([#1417](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-lambda-powertools-python/issues/1417))
